Title: Publishing to Discord
Content:
Publishing to Discord

This is probably a crazy idea, but I've decided to try using Discord to publish blog and project updates for people to follow and discuss.

I understand that this is very uncommon. But technically, Discord is very similar to Telegram channels/groups, and I've been using them quite successfully for a long time.

Discord is also infinitely better than Twitter. So I'll at least give it a try.

This is what I plan to publish:

  • Shorter versions of blog posts, so people can read them without leaving Discord.
  • "Today I learned"-type findings.
  • Updates on my open-source projects.

If you'd like to watch this plot unfold to its inevitable misery and demise, join me:
